history.heading: Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:
history.title: Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
2B206 Dimensional inspection machines, instruments or systems, other than those described in 2B006, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:
Having any of the following:
d.1. Having any of the following:
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the full operating range, for LVDTs with a full operating range up to and including ±5 mm; or
d.1.a. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the full operating range, for LVDTs with a full operating range up to and including ±5 mm; or
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
d.1.b. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K.
d.2. Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K.

history.text:
Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:
Having any of the following:
d.1. Having any of the following:
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the full operating range, for LVDTs with a full operating range up to and including ±5 mm; or
d.1.a. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the full operating range, for LVDTs with a full operating range up to and including ±5 mm; or
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
d.1.b. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K.
d.2. Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K.
